meanings.definition: The act of selling goods in large quantities to retailers or other businesses.
meanings.sent1: Wholesaling helps businesses get products to stores quickly.
meanings.sent2: The wholesaling of electronics is a common practice in the industry.
meanings.sent3: When the robot started wholesaling bananas, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: The wholesaling of ideas can lead to a flourishing marketplace of innovation.
meanings.sent5: In the world of wholesaling, efficiency is key to success.

meanings.definition: The business of selling goods in large quantities to retailers or other businesses.
meanings.sent1: She decided to start her own wholesaling company for office supplies.
meanings.sent2: Wholesaling requires strong relationships with manufacturers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's secret dream was to become a wholesaling tycoon.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a wholesaling warehouse of creative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The wholesaling industry plays a vital role in the supply chain.
